'''Matthar''' is an unidentified background character in the [[Season 1|first season]]. He is a newly made [[Ranger]] of the [[Night's Watch]], of the same group of recruits as [[Jon Snow]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Matthar is also called Matt. Like [[Grenn]] and [[Pyp]], he becomes friends with Jon.
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 1]]===
Matthar is present during the speech [[Lord Commander of the Night's Watch|Lord Commander]] [[Jeor Mormont]] gave to the "graduating" recruits. Matthar is assigned to the Rangers.<ref>"[[You Win or You Die]]"</ref>
